channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2023070143
item.description:
Report X-2023070143

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-28T15:11:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-28
  • City: WALLINGFORD
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found while unloading trailer 841883 from hub 72 (Metuchen). It was noted as being soaked and still leaking. It was taken off the trailer and held for the haz mat expert. DescribePack: One of the bottles had almost completely spilled out all over the interior and on the other bottle. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: It was brought outside and segregated.

item.title: Report X-2023070138
item.description:
Report X-2023070138

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-28T15:11:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-29
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023070138 SequenceEvent: Contents leaked wetting the bottom of the carton during sortation. Upon discovery the pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and sent to QA where it was later transferred to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps on 4 x 1 gal plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin. 2. X-2023070140 SequenceEvent: Contents leaked wetting the bottom half of the carton during sortation. Upon discovery of the leak pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and sent to QA where it was later transferred to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps on 3 x 1 gal plastic bottles and a missing cap on 1 x 1 gal plastic bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2023070163
item.description:
Report X-2023070163

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-27T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-28
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: A loose cap allowed liquid to leak from the cap of the improperly shipped Hazmat. Shipper provided the product name as the "Technical Name". Liquid seeped in to the OP-900LLP Hazmat tag pouch on the side of the container. Upon discovery of the leaking container it was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and sent to QA where it was later transferred to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: A loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg was properly placed in a lined Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2023061738
item.description:
Report X-2023061738

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-27T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-28
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg began to leak during sortation wetting and partially dissolving the top edge and side panel as well as causing the corner seam to fail. Upon discovery the pkg was placewd in a lined Hazmat bin and sent to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: A loose cap on 1 x 1 gal plastic bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin.
